attributes.action: Stop Tabloids Publishing Panic Coronavirus Headlines. They create Hysteria.
attributes.additional_details: To keep the public calm and the economy strong.
attributes.background: Newspapers like the Sun are publishing false headlines like “outbreak!” That are creating panic buying, hysteria and seriously damaging the economy. The government should hold these tabloids to account.

rejection.details:
Complaints about the press are the responsibility of the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), not  the Government or Parliament. 

You can find out how to make a complaint to IPSO here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/makeacomplaint.html
